experience.description: Over the past 10 years, Devoloped many projects from Scratch, Such as E-commerce shops, Porfolios and Websites for companies, Integrated LiveChats and Live Forums for Webistes, On top of that I have strong backgroud in Crypto Space and Web 3 Space, Developed Volume Bot in Spl token.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: ILeadership & Collaboration Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams towards common goals, fostering collaboration and motivation among team members. Communication & Stakeholder Management Excellent verbal and written communication skills, adept at conveying complex technical concepts clearly to stakeholders at all levels. Skilled in building and maintaining relationships with stakeholders, understanding their needs, and ensuring alignment with project objectives. Problem-solving & Adaptability Strong problem-solving skills, capable of identifying and addressing technical challenges swiftly and effectively. Flexible and adaptable in dynamic environments, able to adjust strategies and priorities to accommodate changing project requirements. Organization & Time Management Strong organizational skills, capable of managing multiple tasks and projects simultaneously, ensuring deadlines are met and resources are allocated efficiently. Efficient time management skills, adept at prioritizing tasks and allocating resources effectively to meet project milestones and deliverables. Negotiation & Empathy Proficient in negotiation techniques, capable of resolving conflicts and reaching mutually beneficial agreements among team members and stakeholders. Ability to understand the perspectives and concerns of team members and stakeholders, fostering a supportive and inclusive work environment. Risk Management & Resilience Experienced in identifying and mitigating project risks, implementing proactive measures to minimize potential impacts on project outcomes. Resilience in handling setbacks and challenges during the development process, maintaining a positive attitude and finding solutions to overcome obstacles. Continuous Learning & Creativity Commitment to continuous learning and skill development, staying updated with the latest technologies and best practices in software development. Creative thinking abilities, capable of developing innovative solutions to complex technical problems and optimizing code for efficiency and performance. Attention to Detail & User Experience Meticulous attention to detail, ensuring code quality, documentation accuracy, and overall product excellence. Understanding of user experience principles, ensuring that developed solutions are intuitive, user-friendly, and aligned with end-user needs and preferences. .
